ygData.subject: Planar Muffins
ygData.msgSnippet: This is a truly innane thought, but, like so many things in my life comes with a voiceover that whispers what if it just worked? . Is there any plane that on,
ygData.messageBody:
This is a truly innane thought, but, like so many things in my life comes
with a voiceover that whispers "what if it just worked?".
Is there any plane that on, say a weekend night, I would have ANY chance of
getting to and offering NagaThin Muffins N' Milk in shout and THEN (here's
the hard part) getting back alive? I know it is different on different
servers but is it even remotely possible?

All I need is the screenshot, I SURE don't need to stay there for any length
of time...

Tszaaz E'Taurguin, 26, NagaThin Industries, Povar
